name: Social Distance Enforcers
description:
You’re Indian Cop enforcing social distancing and #stayathome policy in this wannabe music rhythm game with lazy handmade pattern :)

Inspired by this video: www.youtube.com/watch?v=BL0f24Img5U

gfx,code: me

music: www.youtube.com/watch?v=j_BhfRhGTHM

done in <48h for Ludum Dare 46 but I started really late so posting this in Jam. Also the music is not mine :(

Controls: SPACE - Start/Jump Left/Right - hit left/right ESC - back to menu
